episodes.title: Liz Gregory On Gloriavale Leader Howard Temple’s Indecent Assault Charges
episodes.description:
Michael Laws talks to Liz Gregory from Gloriavale Leavers' Support Trust about Gloriavale Leader Howard Temple’s indecent assault charges.

Watch the full interview at https://theplatform.kiwi/
